mapper.sql: a.asset_id, a.community_id, a.asset_type, a.asset_name, a.asset_traditional_name, a.asset_english_name, a.asset_position, a.asset_traditional_position, a.asset_english_position, a.create_time, a.update_time,a.asset_describe, a.asset_traditional_describe, a.asset_english_describe, c.community_id,c.community_no,c.community_name
mapper.select: select img.image_id, img.image_url, img.image_thumbnail, img.object_id, img.image_type, img.create_time as img_create_time, img.update_time as img_update_time from images img where img.object_id=#{noticeId} and img.image_type=3

select
from asset a inner join community c on a.community_id=c.community_id
CONCAT(IFNULL(a.asset_name,''),IFNULL(a.asset_position,'')) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND a.community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by a.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into asset (asset_id, community_id, asset_type, asset_name, asset_traditional_name, asset_english_name, asset_position, asset_traditional_position, asset_english_position, create_time, update_time, asset_describe, asset_traditional_describe, asset_english_describe) values (#{assetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetTraditionalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetTraditionalPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetEnglishPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{assetDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{assetTraditionalDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{assetEnglishDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update asset
community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_type = #{assetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_name = #{assetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_traditional_name = #{assetTraditionalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_english_name = #{assetEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_position = #{assetPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_traditional_position = #{assetTraditionalPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_english_position = #{assetEnglishPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
asset_describe = #{assetDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
asset_traditional_describe = #{assetTraditionalDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
asset_english_describe = #{assetEnglishDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where asset_id = #{assetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update asset set community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asset_type = #{assetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asset_name = #{assetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asset_traditional_name = #{assetTraditionalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asset_english_name = #{assetEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asset_position = #{assetPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asset_traditional_position = #{assetTraditionalPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asset_english_position = #{assetEnglishPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, asset_describe = #{assetDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, asset_traditional_describe = #{assetTraditionalDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, asset_english_describe = #{assetEnglishDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where asset_id = #{assetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
